resources.string: The maximum frequency to be applied when loading default configurations.
The minimum frequency to be applied when loading default configurations.
This editor has unsaved changes, if you close without saving all changes will be lost. Do you want to save the content?
You will be asked to grant cpu tuner superuser access. Please grant it and check the remember checkbox. Without this access cpu tuner will not work.
Change the way it is displayed.
Backup and restore configurations (i.e. a set of triggers, profiles and governors).
Load configurations based on time and weekday.
Choose a different language. You will have to reopen cpu tuner.
Change the way profiles, triggers and governors behave.
Change the way service switches (e.g. mobile date, wifi or bluetooth) behave.
A trigger with the same name already exists! Choose a new name.
A trigger with the same battery level already exists! Change the battery level.
A profile with the same name already exists! Choose a new name.
Please enter a virtual governor name
A virtual governor with the same name already exists! Choose a new name.
A configuration with this name already exists.
The configuration name must not be empty.
License of the used service icons from cyanogenmod. Thanks for the nice icons.
Cpu tuner detected a unusable configuration and is unable to run properly. Do you want to load a configuration?
Loading this configuration did not produce a valid configuration! Either the configuration is broken or something went wrong while loading. Please try again (with an other config).
This configuration cannot be saved since it is not usable. There are either no trigger, profiles or virtual governors
The profile are listed in the reverse sequence. Cpu tuner starts at the bottom and chooses the first profile that matches the current state

You enabled \"manual service changes\" in settings.
This means that services will not get switched when changed outside cpu tuner.
Pulsed services and back to previous will get applied as normal.
Wifi will not switch if connected to a network. Change this in settings.

The statistic extension generates nicer and more detailed statistics.
It helps you to fine tune you settings by giving you additional information.
Work in progress...
Buy a cookie for my kid
This will make me even happier. (And less drunk!)
This will keep my kid occupied and probable lets me fix a bug (no promises made).
This will keep my kid occupied for some time and probable lets me implement a feature (no promises made).
Buy my kid a new toy
Add new features to cpu tuner
Reset the statistics and use the current state as baseline for the future

Some services have been manualy changed and will not be managed by cpu tuner until the next trigger.
Click text to reset.
Do you want to reset all manually changed services and let cpu tuner handle further switches again?
Add to statusbar and notification area.
Wait for some time (in s) bevore starting the first pulse.
